subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adam Dunn hit a wind-blown fly ball yesterday that deflected off the glove of Xavier Nady and went over the wall for a two-run homer, a goofy play that set the tone for the Reds’ 7-5 victory against the Pittsburgh Pirates in wintry conditions in Cincinnati.
snippet: Adam Dunn hit a wind-blown fly ball yesterday that deflected off the glove of Xavier Nady and went over the wall for a two-run homer, a goofy play that set the tone for the Reds’ 7-5 victory against the Pittsburgh Pirates in wintry conditions...
